caption.p: Projected multiyear mean changes in the frequency of extreme events over East Asia. Projected changes in the frequency of heat wave days ( A), heavy precipitation days ( B), and atmospheric stagnation days ( C) over East Asia are shown from current (2006 to 2010) to future (2046 to 2050) years under RCP4.5. The dots denote areas where changes are statistically significant at the 90% level, as determined by a Studentâ€™s 2-sample t test.
